name: jugglingdb
author: Anatoliy Chakkaev
description: ORM for every database: redis, mysql, neo4j, mongodb, postgres

scripts.test: ONLY=memory ./support/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit test/*_test.* && ONLY=redis nodeunit test/common_test.js && ONLY=mysql nodeunit test/common_test.js && ONLY=postgres nodeunit test/common_test.js
